SEARCH
Package org.example.common

Interface IBarrel

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
BarrelImpl
public interface IBarrel extends Remote
The IBarrel interface defines the remote methods that can be invoked by clients on databases. It provides operations to interact with the index, search results, and perform data synchronization. This interface extends Remote to enable remote method invocations (RMI).

  • Method Details

    • addToIndex

      void addToIndex(Map<String,Integer> words, String url, List<String> toUrls, String titulo, String citaçao) throws RemoteException, SQLException
      Adds words to the index associated with a URL. This method inserts the words and their frequencies into the database, along with the associated URL and its metadata.
      Parameters:
      words - A map of words and their corresponding frequencies.
      url - The URL where the words were found.
      toUrls - A list of URLs linked from the given URL.
      titulo - The title of the webpage associated with the URL.
      citaçao - A citation or snippet from the webpage.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs while processing the data.

    • search

      List<SearchResult> search(ArrayList<String> search) throws RemoteException
      Searches for a list of words in the index and returns a list of search results. Each result contains a URL, its associated title, citation, and the number of matches.
      Parameters:
      search - A list of words to search for in the index.
      Returns:
      A list of SearchResult objects containing matching URLs and their details.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • getConnections

      SearchResult getConnections(String url) throws RemoteException
      Searches for all URL connections of the given URL.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL given to search for its connections
      Returns:
      the search results as a SearchResult object
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote error occurs during the search

    • containsUrl

      boolean containsUrl(String url) throws RemoteException
      Checks whether a URL is contained in the index.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to check.
      Returns:
      true if the URL is indexed; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • getTopSearches

      List<String> getTopSearches() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the top searched words in the index. This method returns the most frequently searched words in the index.
      Returns:
      A list of the top searched words.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • getSize

      int getSize() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the size of the index. This method returns the number of entries in the word_url table.
      Returns:
      The number of entries in the index.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • getFrequentWords

      List<String> getFrequentWords() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the most frequent words in the index. This method returns the most frequent words in the word_url table.
      Returns:
      A list of the most frequent words.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • getFicheiro

      String getFicheiro() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the filename or file path associated with the Barrel's data.
      Returns:
      The file path of the Barrel's data file.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • updateTopWords

      void updateTopWords(ArrayList<String> words) throws RemoteException
      Updates the top frequency of a list of words in the index. This method increments the "top" value of each word in the word table.
      Parameters:
      words - A list of words whose top value should be incremented.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • connect

      void connect() throws RemoteException
      Connects to the database of the Barrel. This method establishes a connection to the Barrel's database.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • getFile

      byte[] getFile() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the contents of the Barrel's data file. This method returns the content of the Barrel's file as a byte array.
      Returns:
      The content of the Barrel's data file as a byte array.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • sync

      void sync(IBarrel barrel) throws RemoteException
      Synchronizes data between two Barrels. This method transfers the data from the current Barrel to the given Barrel.
      Parameters:
      barrel - The Barrel to synchronize data with.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.

    • receberCopia

      void receberCopia(byte[] ficheiro) throws RemoteException
      Receives a copy of the data file from another Barrel. This method writes the received file content to the Barrel's data file.
      Parameters:
      ficheiro - The byte array containing the data to be written.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication issue with the remote server.
